title: Why in God's name would I ever want to buffer a Pyke ult?
body: Fun thing that happens if you Pyke ult within a certain amount of time of getting out of CC: You will cast it immediately. The problem with this is that Pyke's ult is a skillshot with a noticeable cast time and a short range, so in the majority of cases where this happens it is almost a guaranteed miss.

replies.body: The same reason one would want to buffer final spark: comedic value.
